alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 10 at 2:38PM EST until December 11 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 8 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.9 to 7.5 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Southern Bristol MA County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along the most vulnerable shoreline locales in Newport, Portsmouth and Middletown. This includes flooding at parking lots near beaches in Newport, and a portion of Hazard Road. Minor coastal flooding also occurs on several streets in the Common Fence Point area. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington
